briefdescription.para: Let the buffer use straight sides along segments (the default)

detaileddescription.para: This strategy can be used as SideStrategy for the buffer algorithm. It is currently the only provided strategy for this purpose

para.qbk: [heading Example] See the examples for other buffer strategies, for example [link geometry.reference.strategies.strategy_buffer_join_round join_round] [heading See also] \* [link geometry.reference.algorithms.buffer.buffer_7_with_strategies buffer (with strategies)]
